entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
